title: Talking to Teens About Cannabis Gummies as Use Booms
sub_head: Candy-like marijuana products have become the stealth way of getting high for more teens. Here’s how to talk to your kid about them.
body:
Schools and doctors say more teens are getting high at school on candies or cookies containing cannabis.
The expanding legalization of recreational marijuana across the U.S. has led to wider availability of cannabis edibles. Their popularity has created vexing problems for educators and families, who say it has become harder to detect teens’ cannabis use.
